oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Design and evolution of water networks by source shifts
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PRAKASH, R
SHENOY, UV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: process plants
process design
optimization
network synthesis
waste water minimization
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper proposes the concept of source shifts to design many different water networks, all of which satisfy the minimum freshwater target. The concept is also used to evolve these networks to simpler designs with fewer matches for implementation in practice. A matching matrix is introduced as a compact network representation to perform such shifts. (c) 2004
